name: Escape! (itch) (joshg6256)
description: Escape! is a simple platform game where the user must escape the building within a given time whist items called batteries to power the helicopter. The game also features additional elements such as camera shaking to put the user under pressure. The user will try and complete the level to move on. As they progress through the game, the game will get harder with taller and wider buildings, more items to collect, shorter timers and increased game shaking.
